entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
